import NavComp from '../components/NavComp'; import Collapse from 'react-bootstrap/Collapse'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; import RandomMonster1 from './randomMaster'; import {randomMonsterName, randomLandMark, randomTreasure, randomVerb} from "./randomMaster" export default function Encounter() { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const [level, setLevel ] = useState(1-5) const clickHandle = event => { event.preventDefault() RandomMonster1(level) } return ( <>

setOpen(!open)} aria-controls="example-collapse-text" aria-expanded={open} >

Monster Name

Anim pariatur cliche reprehenderit, enim eiusmod high life accusamus terry richardson ad squid. Nihil anim keffiyeh helvetica, craft beer labore wes anderson cred nesciunt sapiente ea proident.
) }
